summary: Legs Sadovsky gets four other high school girls to think for themselves and react to a teacher's sexual harassment, which gets them suspended. They bond, and rebel, at an abandoned house.

keywords: teenage girl|scantily clad female|lesbian kiss|kicked in the balls|abusive teacher
title: Jóvenes incomprendidas
